task.title: Creating a Batch
task.abstract: Users can create ad hoc payments for a batch.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Batches tab in the Accounting application and click the New button.
Enter the field values for Batch Name, Expected Count, and Expected Amount.
If a default payment gateway on the Preferences page of the Framework application has not been selected, select a Payment Gateway using the lookup. Click the Save button.

taskbody.result:
After saving the new batch...
The Opened Date will default to today's date.
The Business Group is linked to the related business group from the batch inherited from the logged in user's assigned business group.
The Deposit Account field autopopulates with the GL account related to the Deposit account for the batch.
The Default Entity and Payment Type fields autopopulate with the default configurations from the receipt.
taskbody.postreq: Post-requisites: Enter receipts for the newly created batch.
